en.description: The Euphona Prime is a Prime shotgun type sidearm and the signature weapon of Banshee Prime, capable of two different firing modes. The primary fire shoots a slug for longer range engagements while the Alternate Fire shoots wider spread shots for close range fights.
en.codex: Banshee Prime's signature shotgun is an instrument of devastation that fires both focused and broad shots.

ru.description: Именной дробовик Банши Прайм - это инструмент разрушения, убивающий равно как прицельным, так и беглым огнём.
